name: Blood Required
description:
After a failed ritual, you - the abnormal Bloodmancer - unleashed a terrible soul upon the land! It's now your job to put it to rest once more.

Made in two days for the Godot Wild Jam 50! With the theme Ritual. The idea was to make a simple game, similar to the basic Dodge the Creeps but with a twist, to try out the Godot 4 beta.

Since I used Godot 4, I wasn't able to make a web export :(.

Controls:
WASD - move
HOLD mouse left click - start casting
mouse right click - heal if you have a potion
